channel.title: Help A Guy Out :)
channel.description: Hi, I want to know how to make it so when I run the client I am using, it pops up a web page. I have absolutly no idea how to do this, could someone please tell me how? thx (If you do help me I will pay $1.50 via payal)

item.title: Help A Guy Out :)
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

You can use a galkon client or create your own bar at the top that allows users to click the website if they want.
Forceing the website to open can anoy players

If you use galkons just change all the links to your own links

Read full topic
